review: I bought mine directly from Google. What a great idea. I originally wanted it for Redbox's streaming service, now I use it for most of the popular streaming services as well as YouTube. Start a video on my Android phone or tablet, watch on the big screen.The only two downsides I've found are:1) things get weird if you turn off the tablet during the video, and2) not all programming is available. I've found a number of YouTube videos that will play on the tablet but won't transfer to the TV. Also, not all streaming services are compatible. I'm sure they'll be added given time.It would also be great to play a DVD or Blu Ray on my laptop and watch it on the TV via Chromecast, especially when traveling.
author: J. Shevell "jdshevel"

review: This streamer would have been perfect except that it is NOT compatible with Windows Vista.  This is not stated clearly in the advertised area or description.  It is in the fine print, but that is not a practicle area to display such information.  Some of us out here are not very technically savvy, so it would have been REALLY nice to know that it wouldn't work with my computer before I went to the bother of buying it, and then having to return it.
author: auntbunnyrabbit

review: Well, actually I had a bit of a problem getting it to work. I wound up having to contact Google support and was pleasantly surprised when they had an answer - reboot my router. I'm able to watch youtube videos etc just as advertised. But I wish Google would let me stream videos from my PC without all the vendor lock it. For that reason I rated it 4 stars not 5.

review: Bought this for a Christmas gift for my mom since she loves Netflix but is using Wii and doesn't like the quality of the video from it.  I tested it out on my 52" HDTV and it works nicely.My only complaint is that you need a computer, smartphone or tablet to use the device.  That's not an issue for me but my mom doesn't have one in her tv room and I don't think she'll like having to go to the other room to turn it on.  We'll see :)Some reviews send you can NOT watch videos from the computer on this device.  I was able to, so I'm not sure what they were talking about.  I did notice a slight lag between the computer to the tv..  The sound was fine on the tv though.
